extension_description.message: Automatically create file attachments from pasted text content on ChatGPT, Claude, Gemini, DeepSeek & Grok AI platforms. Features batch processing and smart language detection.

extension_context.message: Extension context lost - please refresh page

extension_reloaded.message: Extension was reloaded - please refresh page

header_subtitle.message: Auto-converts long pastes and auto-attaches clean files in ChatGPT, Claude, Gemini, DeepSeek & Grok. Supports Auto-Detect and 20+ formats including code files.

about_description.message: Multi-AI File Paster detects when you paste long text (code, documentation, data) and converts it into properly formatted files. This keeps chats clean and within platform limits.

analytics_description.message: Help improve the extension by sharing anonymous usage counts only (files created, errors encountered). Never collects content, URLs, or personal data. Fully optional and can be disabled anytime.

analytics_note_text.message: Analytics dashboard is only visible when this option is enabled.

auto_attach_tooltip.message: FEATURE Converts long pastes into a clean file and auto-attaches it to your chat. Keeps messages tidy and within limits on ChatGPT, Claude, Gemini, DeepSeek and Grok. Turn off to paste normally and use Manual Save.

batch_active_tip.message: Batch mode is active - multiple files will be processed

batch_auto_attach_tip.message: Auto-attach will process all files in batch mode

batch_delay_tip.message: Delay applies to each file in batch processing

batch_delay_tooltip.message: TIMING Time delay between uploading each batch file (100ms to 2000ms). Higher delays reduce the chance of being flagged for spam by AI platforms. This setting is automatically disabled when the main 'User Delay' toggle is active above - in that case, the main delay setting takes priority for all file uploads.

batch_mode_tooltip.message: BETA Splits large content into multiple files based on your Max Files setting. Divides content by lines and uses smart language detection for file extensions. Creates files named part1, part2, part3, part4. Perfect for splitting large documents, code files, or any content that exceeds platform limits. Each part gets proper file extension based on content analysis.

claude_override_tooltip.message: FEATURE Claude includes its own paste-to-file feature. Enable this to always use Multi-AI File Paster for more consistent formatting and naming.

clear_data_warning.message: This will permanently delete all your usage statistics and cannot be undone.

config_analytics_dashboard.message: Analytics Dashboard: Track usage patterns and file creation statistics

config_auto_attach.message: Auto Attach: Automatically detects and converts long pastes (customizable word threshold: 50-15,000 words)

config_batch_processing.message: Batch Processing: Split large content into 2-4 files with smart line division

config_claude_integration.message: Claude Integration: Works alongside or replaces Claude's built-in paste-to-file feature

config_delay.message: Delay: Optional 1-15 second countdown prevents accidental attachments

config_manual_override.message: Manual Override: On-demand conversion of typed text to file attachments

config_multi_format.message: Multi-Format Support: Choose from 20+ file types including programming languages, markup, data formats, and custom extensions

config_platform_optimization.message: Platform Optimization: Special handling for each AI platform's unique file attachment system

console_config_load_failed.message: GPTPF: Failed to load config.js in background worker:

custom_format_tooltip.message: SECURITY Enter only letters/numbers of the extension without dots (e.g., log, data, cfg). Risky executable types are blocked.

debug_background_save_no_tab.message: No active tab found for save

debug_deepseek_should_handle_paste.message: Checking if DeepSeek should handle paste

debug_disabled.message: Debug mode disabled - Only errors will show

debug_enabled.message: Debug mode enabled - Debug messages and popup notifications will show

debug_grok_should_handle_paste.message: Checking if Grok should handle paste

debug_level_tooltip.message: DEBUG Control which debug messages appear in popup notifications. Errors Only shows critical issues, Warnings & Errors includes warnings, All Messages shows everything including info logs.

debug_batch_content_too_short.message: Content too short for batch processing

debug_batch_split_insufficient.message: Content could not be meaningfully split into multiple parts

debug_batch_too_few_lines.message: Content has too few lines for meaningful batch split: $1 lines

errors_attachment_failed.message: File attachment failed. Please refresh the page and try again

errors_busy_processing.message: Another file attachment is in progress. Please wait

errors_connection_failed.message: Cannot connect to the page. Please refresh and try again

errors_extension_context.message: Extension context issue. Please refresh the page and try again

errors_extension_reloaded.message: Extension was reloaded. Please refresh the page and try again

errors_network_error.message: Network error. Check your internet connection and try again

errors_no_file_input.message: Cannot find file upload area. Try clicking the attachment button on the platform first

errors_no_input_field.message: Cannot find chat input field. Make sure you are on a supported AI chat page

errors_no_response.message: No response from the page. Please refresh and try again

errors_no_tab_access.message: Cannot access the current tab. Please try again

errors_no_text_input.message: No text found in chat input. Type your message first

errors_permission_denied.message: Permission denied. Please refresh the page and try again

errors_platform_not_supported.message: This AI platform is not supported. Try ChatGPT, Claude, Gemini, DeepSeek, or Grok

errors_text_too_short.message: Text too short ($1 words). Minimum $2 words required

errors_text_too_short_manual.message: Text too short for manual save. Either add more text or lower the Min Words setting

errors_invalid_content_type.message: Invalid content: text must be a non-empty string

errors_invalid_content_empty.message: Invalid content: text cannot be empty

errors_file_creation_failed.message: Failed to create valid file object

errors_text_content_empty.message: Text content is empty or invalid

errors_platform_attach_failed.message: Platform handler failed to attach file

feature_request_desc.message: Suggest new features or improvements to make it better

feedback_default_description.message: Please describe your feedback or issue

feedback_improvement_description.message: What improvements would you like to see?

feedback_question.message: What type of feedback would you like to send?

file_format_tooltip.message: SETTINGS Pick a file type, or choose Auto-Detect. Auto-Detect uses conservative language detection with a safe fallback to .txt to avoid mislabeling code. Custom allows any extension but use with caution.

file_operations_batch_detected.message: Large content detected. Splitting into $1 files

general_feedback_desc.message: Share your thoughts, suggestions, or user experience

key_features_text.message: Auto-Detect picks the right file type from your content with a guaranteed fallback to .txt. Works across ChatGPT, Claude, Gemini, DeepSeek, and Grok. Supports 20+ file formats including programming languages, markup, data formats, and custom extensions.

manual_action_tooltip.message: FEATURE Manually convert any text you've typed into the chat input into a file attachment. Works on any AI platform. Perfect for when you want to create a file from your current message without auto-detection.

manual_drag_drop.message: Manual drag & drop may be needed

max_files_tooltip.message: SETTINGS Number of files to split content into. Range: 2-4 files. Content is divided equally by lines across the selected number of files. Higher numbers create smaller files but may trigger platform spam detection. Only activates when content exceeds your word limit setting.

min_words_tooltip.message: SETTINGS Auto-attach only runs when your paste is at least this long. Recommended: 100+ words so short messages stay inline.

modal_description.message: Enter a custom file format extension

new_version_text.message: Batch Mode splits large content into multiple files, smart language detection automatically selects file extensions, and improved analytics dashboard tracks your usage patterns.

no_file_input.message: No file input found on page

platform_chatgpt.message: OpenAI ChatGPT: Full support for both chat.openai.com and chatgpt.com

platform_claude.message: Anthropic Claude: Advanced integration with claude.ai including override for built-in features

platform_deepseek.message: DeepSeek AI: Complete compatibility with chat.deepseek.com

platform_gemini.message: Google Gemini: Optimized file handling for gemini.google.com

platform_grok.message: Grok: Standard integration with grok.com (attach button + drag-drop)

platform_specific_chatgpt_no_input.message: Cannot find ChatGPT file input. Try clicking the attachment button first, then retry

platform_specific_claude_no_input.message: Cannot find Claude file input. Try clicking the attachment icon first, then retry

platform_specific_gemini_no_input.message: Cannot find Gemini file input. Try clicking the paperclip icon first, then retry

platform_specific_generic_no_input.message: Try clicking the attachment button on the platform first, then retry

platform_specific_manual_drag_drop.message: Still cannot find file input. Please attach the file manually by dragging it to the chat

platforms_claude.message: Claude: Native support for claude.ai conversations

platforms_description.message: Integrates with the most popular AI chat platforms:

platforms_grok.message: Grok: Full compatibility with x.ai platform

platforms_why_text.message: Each platform has different file attachment systems. Our extension handles these differences automatically, ensuring your files attach correctly regardless of which AI you're using.

privacy_description.message: All text processing happens entirely on your device. Your content never leaves your computer - no servers, no cloud processing, no data transmission.

privacy_do.message: Process your text locally to create file attachments, then immediately discard the processed data. Simple, secure, transparent.

privacy_dont.message: We never read, store, or transmit your text content, URLs, personal information, or browsing data. Your conversations with AI remain completely private.

reset_modal_question.message: Are you sure you want to reset all Multi-AI File Paster settings to their default values?

settings_auto_attach_disabled.message: Auto attach disabled. Use the manual save button to attach files

settings_auto_attach_enabled.message: Auto attach enabled. Files will attach automatically when you paste

settings_batch_mode_disabled.message: Batch mode disabled. Auto attach restored

settings_batch_mode_enabled.message: Batch mode enabled. Auto attach disabled while batch mode is active

settings_claude_override_disabled.message: Claude override disabled. Claude will use built-in features

settings_claude_override_enabled.message: Claude override enabled. Extension will work on Claude

settings_telemetry_disabled.message: Analytics disabled. No usage data will be collected

settings_telemetry_enabled.message: Analytics enabled. This helps improve the extension

smart_file_attachment.message: Smart File Attachment for AI Chats

success_feedback_sent.message: Feedback email opened successfully! Thank you for helping us improve.

success_not_on_platform.message: Not on a supported AI platform. Open ChatGPT, Claude, Gemini, DeepSeek, or Grok first

support_request_desc.message: Get help with issues, bugs, or technical problems

theme_selection_tooltip.message: SETTINGS Choose your preferred theme for highlighting and colors. Each theme provides different visual styling for the extension interface.

try_attachment_button.message: Try using the attachment button instead

ui_components_batch_auto_attach_tip.message: BATCH ACTIVE Auto Attach is disabled when Batch Mode is enabled. Batch Mode handles file attachment automatically for split content. Turn off Batch Mode to use Auto Attach for regular single files.

ui_components_batch_delay_tip.message: BATCH ACTIVE This setting is disabled when Batch Mode is enabled. Batch Mode uses its own delay setting for file uploads. Turn off Batch Mode to use this delay setting.

ui_components_batch_manual_action_tip.message: BATCH ACTIVE Manual Action is disabled when Batch Mode is enabled. Batch Mode automatically processes content into multiple files. Turn off Batch Mode to use Manual Action for single files.

debug_using_popup_flash.message: Using popup flash instead of content script

ui_components_disabled_title.message: Open AI chat and type text to attach as file

ui_components_modal_description.message: Enter a filename (without extension). Leave blank to use the default name.

ui_components_modal_hint.message: Allowed: letters, numbers, spaces, dashes, underscores (max 64). No extension.

ui_components_modal_keys_hint.message: Press Enter to save · Esc to cancel

use_delay_tooltip.message: TIMING Adds a short countdown before attaching. Helpful if you sometimes paste by mistake - you can cancel during the countdown.

validation_invalid_characters.message: Only letters, numbers, spaces, dashes and underscores are allowed

validation_no_dots_needed.message: No dots or extensions needed - file format is set in the extension popup

validation_security_risk.message: Security risk: executable extensions are not allowed

validation_security_risk_executable.message: Security risk: Executable file extensions are not allowed

batch_part_skipped.message: Batch part skipped - content too small

batch_split_avoided.message: Batch splitting avoided for structured content

batch_split_insufficient.message: Content could not be meaningfully split into parts

batch_split_skipped.message: Content too short for batch processing

claude_invalid_text.message: Invalid text content for Claude processing

claude_removing_pasted_element.message: Removing pasted text element from Claude

fileAttachComponent_error.message: File attachment component encountered an error

file_creation_empty_content.message: Warning: File created with no content

makeFile_invalid_content.message: Invalid content provided to makeFile function

makeFile_invalid_format.message: Invalid format provided to makeFile function
